sql.value: select ID, JOB_ID, TRIGGER_TIME, TRIGGER_BY, EXE_RESULT, SPEND_TIME_MILLIS, FINISH_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME from sche_job_log where DELETE_STATUS = 1 #[and JOB_ID = :jobId] #[and TRIGGER_TIME between :beginTime and :endTime] #[and EXE_RESULT = exeResult] order by CREATE_TIME desc
